title: Fun, female font for logo
content:
Hi - I’m after a font for the logo of a brand aimed at 20 something women. It needs to be confident, fun with a hint of something sexy? ! A tall order I know - but can anybody help? !

Do you think I should go serif or sans-serif?

Thanks

 [‹ Help! Question about typeface usage on Mac](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011005449/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45930 "Go to previous forum topic") [2 jobs at media magazine based in Montreal - Assistant Art Director and Graphic Designer ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011005449/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33366 "Go to next forum topic")
author: ericarnoldgp

comments.content:
I would really need to know the name. It’s hard to choose for a logo without knowing which letters are involved.

Sharon

I think Apple Chancery or Monotype Corsiva would work just fine.

;)
Nofret or Bitstream Carmina? But as Sharon says, it may be letter-dependent.

Thanks for your suggestions! - my favourite so far is defo Bitstream Carmina!

Cheers
